A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 30, 2010''', at 01:09 UTC. It was announced on [[The Word of Notch]] at 01:22 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:360469298|Phew, last indev update for today]] – The Word of Notch, January 30, 2010, 01:22 UTC</ref>

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Beast_Boy.png|32px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mob]]'''
* Now has a third skin, commonly known as "Beast Boy".

=== World generation ===
* Re-added the infinite lava sea at the bottom of the map.
** This time it is infinitely deep.

== Removals ==
'''[[Score]]'''
* Removed the score in the top right of the screen.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />

'''[[Statistics]]'''
* Player statistics are now removed from the inventory.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" /></onlyinclude>

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''

'''From 20100122-2251'''
* Fixed an infinite reach bug.

'''From 20100128-2200'''
* Fixed graphical glitch with using swords.

'''From 20100129-1447'''
* Dropped stacks of items now smelt as separate items (previously only 1 item would smelt and the rest disappeared).
* Right-clicking on stacked crafted items takes out all of them instead of just one.

'''From 20100129-2332'''
* Mobs can be hit through blocks<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|19:57:44 <Notch> wait, I'll fix the "hitting mobs through walls" bug ;D}}</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''3 bugs reported'''
* The number on hotbar items also pulses when new items are picked up.
* The X-Ray effect caused by having the player's head in a block is now permanent as long as the player stays in a block.
* Bows disappear from the hotbar when {{control|used}} without arrows.
* The screen appears as black on [[w:MacOS|MacOS]]<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|20:09:58 <TkTech> Notch: Are you aware of the minecraft screen going black and never coming back under OS X 10.6.2 Safari 64bit. It doesn't happen with any other java applet."..."20:10:07 <TkTech> Notch: Whenever safari looses focus, *poof*"..."Jan 29 20:11:38 <Notch> indev's been updated"..."Jan 29 20:11:55 <TkTech> Yeah, after said update it doesn't work for me anymore xD"}}</ref>.
